​ Before I met Yumeno, I just thought she was another unfortunate girl who I'd use later once this was all over. I didn't really care much about who she was but rather what she could do. In fact I didn't have good intentions for anyone here once I was free. --But... Yumeno did things that changed my thoughts about her. She went out of her way to buy me something to use for a psych... something that you have on your person, Uso.

At that moment I decided to become family with her and we exchanged phones. I let her use mines so she could play games and get inspired by things I recommend for her. I wanted to protect her.. but at the same time, I didn't want to be carrying her all the way. You also know first hand that once I saw Yumeno get hurt, I couldn't control myself. I let out all my rage and have no recollection of it. Yet when I came to, she was right in front of me.

Yumeno and I have shared moments cooking, shopping, and having fun. She's done nothing but be supportive of me and believe in me when I never deserved. Even now I may be a bit of scum for doing something, but...I wanted to get to know her more and went through her phone.....After going through it and seeing what type of person Yumeno is... I just want to protect her even more and I'll believe she's beautiful no matter what..
: ​ She's shown me that I do have a chance to do something different with my life once I'm alive. So she's my new family.
